column4: Hi everybody. I have a screen resolution problem. When I modify xorg.conf to add resolutions I don't see them in the System>Preference>Screen Resolution utility.
Does anyone knows how I can change these resolutions ?
Does anyone knows how I can change the possible resolutions of the screen ?
I have an ATI radeon x600
could you post your xorg.conf file to pastebin/
did you recieved the pastebin link ? (http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/26670/plain/)
Oh I'm looking at it now, my bad. we've got the same monitor, lol
hmm syntax looks fine, I'm going to alter mine and restart, and see what happens, brb
fixed the problem by doing what's writen there: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=408111
